thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 50 of 522
thread.title: Emily

author: Emily
title: Emily
text: I love all the styles and the website is super easy to navigate. The only reason this isn't five stars is because you have to click around at first to find a description of the VIP program. It would be easier to just have the program details listed on the front page. I love how the VIP program is set up though so I am definitely coming back for more! I can't wait to receive my first order!
